name: RentalHunt
overview:
<font size="2"> <b>Company</b><br> RentalHunt.com was founded in 2005 and in now one of the premier Rental finding services on the internet. RentalHunt.com offers free rental searches with more powerful search options than other rental web sites.
Rental hunters can begin searching immediately without the requirement of signing up or filling out surveys. <br><br>

<b>Our Mission</b><br> Our mission is to provide Rental Hunters with quick, easy and powerful search options making finding a rental property easy and hassle free and to provide the latest technology to Property Managers reducing the time and expense in listing their rental properties. <br><br>

As a first step in this mission, we developed the latest in rental advertising technology allowing Property Managers to manage their rental advertising campaign utlitizing our <a href="http://www.rentalhunt.com/pm">One-Click Rental Advertising Software</a>. Property Managers can advertise and unadvertise their properties with just “One-Click”.<br><br>

Our latest step is our partnership with <a href="http://www.propertyboss.com">PropertyBoss Solutions</a>, a Greenville, SC-based company offering property management software and services. Using PropertyBossâ€™ PropertyListing with the RentalHunt Internet Listing Service provides landlords and property management companies an easy and efficient automated means to reach millions of potential customers. <br><br>

Please browse our site and find out for yourself why RentalHunt.com is the best option in Rental searching and advertising!</font size>

external_links.title: Rentalhunt.com Announces Revolutionary Property Management Software
